title: Round shield (Construction)

It is painted with a heraldic crest identical to those featured on other painted shields. The round shield is made of oak like the oak shield, but unlike the oak shield, it is unable to be equipped; its sole function is as a decoration. It requires 66 Construction to build and, when built, gives 120 experience. The player must have a hammer and a saw in their inventory to build it.

A round shield is a decorative shield that can be built in the decoration space of the throne room and treasure room in a player-owned house. It is painted with a heraldic crest identical to those featured on other painted shields. The round shield is made of oak like the oak shield, but unlike the oak shield, it is unable to be equipped; its sole function is as a decoration. It requires 66 Construction to build and, when built, gives 120 experience. The player must have a hammer and a saw in their inventory to build it.

The appearance of the decoration is dependent on the player's heraldry, which can be changed speaking to Sir Renitee.

A '''round shield''' is a decorative shield that can be built in the [[decoration space]] of the [[throne room]] and [[treasure room]] in a [[player-owned house]]. It is painted with a [[Sir_Renitee#Heraldry_for_crest|heraldic crest]] identical to those featured on other [[Heraldic_kiteshield_(Construction)|painted shields]]. The round shield is made of oak like the [[oak shield]], but unlike the oak shield, it is unable to be equipped; its sole function is as a decoration. It requires 66 [[Construction]] to build and, when built, gives 120 [[experience]]. The player must have a [[hammer]] and a [[saw]] in their inventory to build it.

The appearance of the decoration is dependent on the player's heraldry, which can be changed speaking to [[Sir Renitee]].
